Features.paragraph: CARP is an international organisation associated with FFWPU. This River South chapter aims to attract young people to pursue our three main pillars.

items.title: Faith Development
items.text: We seek to nurture the spiritual growth of exisiting and new members of our spiritual community.

items.title: Outreach
items.text: We seek to spread the truth and connect as many people to God as possible.

items.title: Community Work
items.text: We seek to practice the principled way of life through serving our greater commnities.
